attributes.action: call an election without delay to give us, the public - subjects and citizens of the United Kingdom the right to give our opinion on his performance.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: given the current problems within westminster we want a fresh start and the only way to achieve this is a new parliament now.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
